T02D1336:311a-41: bzhugs thabs kyis zla ba dang nyi ma zhabs kyis
T02D1336:311a-42: gnan pa / rdo rje dang dril bu dang rde'u chung dang thod pa bsnams pa /
T02D1336:311a-43: phyag rgya lngas yan lag brgyan pa /
T02D1336:311a-44: mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i phyag rgya'i phreng bas ral pa'i dbu rgyan dar gyis bcings pa /
T02D1336:311a-45: shes rab ma yang sku mdog 'dra ba zhal gcig spyan gsum ma /
T02D1336:311a-46: phyag gnyis pa gri gug dang thod pa bsnams pa /
T02D1336:311a-47: rus pa'i rgyan dang ldan pa /
T02D1336:311a-48: phyag rgya lngas rnam par brgyan pa /
T02D1336:311a-49: skra grol ba phyogs kyi na bza' can /
T02D1336:311a-50: nu ma sra ba dang mtho ba /
T02D1336:311a-52: yang na dpa' bo chen po'i gzugs sna tshogs kyi zhal /
T02D1336:311b-2: nam mkha'i kha dog dang ljang gu dang /
T02D1336:311b-3: padma'i sngon po lta bu dang /
T02D1336:311b-6: autpala sngon po dang 'dra ba dang /
T02D1336:311b-14: dpa' bo chen po'i yan lag ma /
T02D1336:311b-21: bag yod thor cog ma dang /
T02D1336:311b-23: zhi ba 'chi ba'i pho nya ma dang /
T02D1336:311b-27: khyab 'jug gi ma dang thog kha ma dang /
T02D1336:311b-28: thams cad skyed byed ma dang /
T02D1336:311b-29: dpa' bo'i yum dang gnyis su med pa'i sbyor bas
T02D1336:311b-30: bde ba chen po'i dga' bas dgyes pa'i yid dang
T02D1336:311b-31: ldan pa / dpa' bo chen po shin tu mdzes pa /
T02D1336:311b-32: dpal nam mkha' dri med dang /
T02D1336:311b-39: thams cad kyi byed pa po dang /
T02D1336:311b-41: zhi ba chen po'i bdag po dang /
T02D1336:311b-45: nag po chen po drag 'joms dang /
T02D1336:311b-47: nam mkha'i zhal te dga' ba bcu drug gis rnam
T02D1336:311b-48: par dag pas dga' ba chen po mthar gyi dus
T02D1336:311b-49: su rtog med ma 'byung ba'i rngam pa dang bral
T02D1336:311b-50: ba'i nang gi reg bya'i ye shes kyi skabs su
T02D1336:311b-51: rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu las steng gi rlung g-yo
T02D1336:311b-53: thig le dang tshul nang gi rang bzhin gyi rlung
T02D1336:311b-54: rang gi gnas pa las gang zhig glo bur gyi
T02D1336:311b-55: rngam pa de lta bu'i bdag nyid kyi rngam pa'i
T02D1336:311b-56: dur khrod du dpa' bo chen po bzhugs so //
T02D1336:311b-57: lung las sprul pa dang chos dang longs spyod dang bde ba chen po bzhi /
T02D1336:311b-58: 'dab ma brgyad kyi padma'i rnam pa ge sar la
T02D1336:311b-59: sogs pa dang bcas pa'i dbus su gnas gcig dang
T02D1336:311b-61: lung las dang po'i gnas chu skyes kyi shar gyi 'dab mar aoo dya na du gzugs ldan ma /
T02D1336:311b-62: byang du dz'a landha rar bum ldan ma /
T02D1336:311b-63: nub tu pull'i rar bya rog sna /
T02D1336:312a-2: me mtshams su m'a l'a bar glang chen kha /
T02D1336:312a-3: srin po'i mtshams su sindhu ra dang po'i stobs ma'o //
T02D1336:312a-4: rlung mtshams su n'a gar ltog ma'o //
T02D1336:312a-5: dbang ldan mtshams su singga lar lce ris ma'o //
T02D1336:312a-6: de dag ni gnas dang nye ba'i gnas shes rab
T02D1336:312a-7: dang thabs gnyis su med pa'i sbyor bas thams cad
T02D1336:312a-8: nang gi dga' ba zhes gsungs so //
T02D1336:312a-9: dbus kyi gnas kyi padma'i shar gyi 'dab mar ma ru nir lo ma ring /
T02D1336:312a-10: byang du de w'i ko t'ir lto ba che /
T02D1336:312a-11: nub tu ko lu tar dri ldan ma /
T02D1336:312a-12: lhor aarbu dar dri do ma /
T02D1336:312a-13: me'i mtshams su ha re ke la bar bsil sbyin ma /
T02D1336:312a-14: srin po'i mtshams su ko ta bar 'od ma /
T02D1336:312a-15: rlung mtshams su lamba kar dbyangs snyan ma /
T02D1336:312a-16: dbang ldan mtshams su k'a nytsi kar pu ling ta ma /
T02D1336:312a-17: de dag ni zhing dang nye ba'i zhing dang 'dun pa dang nye ba'i 'dun pa'i mchog dga'o //
T02D1336:312a-18: tha ma'i gnas kyi padma'i shar gyi 'dab mar las kyi grong du autpala'i dri /
T02D1336:312a-19: byang du gser gling du padma'i khri /
T02D1336:312a-20: nub tu kong ka nar mtsho me tshig byed /
T02D1336:312a-22: me'i mtshams su yi dgas 'dus par rus ldan ma /
T02D1336:312a-23: srin po'i mtshams su rgya mtsho'i ngos su chu srin mig ma /
T02D1336:312a-24: rlung gi mtshams su tsa ri trar nya'i kha /
T02D1336:312a-25: dbang ldan gyi mtshams su gzhon nu'i grong khyer du sna tshogs yan lag ma'o //
T02D1336:312a-26: de dag ni 'dus pa dang nye ba'i 'dus pa dang /
T02D1336:312a-27: dur khrod dang nye ba'i dur khrod tshad pa'i dga' ba'o //
T02D1336:312a-28: bzhi pa'i gnas kyi padma'i shar du kasma rir ga pur lus ma /
T02D1336:312a-29: byang du ke ra tar rma bya'i sgro ma /
T02D1336:312a-30: nub tu ne pa ler 'dod ma /
T02D1336:312a-31: lhor kar nu zar dag pa'i lus ma /
T02D1336:312a-32: me mtshams su 'che med grong khyer du sgra legs ma /
T02D1336:312a-33: srin po'i mtshams su mi yul du sna tshogs padma /
T02D1336:312a-34: rlung gi mtshams su sa 'og tu 'dod pa'i ske rags ma //
T02D1336:312a-35: dbang ldan gyi mtshams su ri rab rtser padma'i zhal lo //
T02D1336:312a-36: de dag ni byi la dang /
T02D1336:312a-38: nye ba'i sbyor ba'i rang bzhin dga' ba'o //
T02D1336:312a-39: dang po'i lte bar shar gyi lus 'phags su srog ma /
T02D1336:312a-40: dbus su byang gi sgra mi snyan du la la n'a /
T02D1336:312a-41: tha ma'i nang du ba lang spyod du ra sa n'a /
T02D1336:312a-42: bzhi pa'i gnas su lho'i 'dzam bu'i gling du aa ba dh'u t'i'o //
T02D1336:312a-43: lung las dpa' bo chen po dang bcas par nang
T02D1336:312b-0: gi 'khor lo'i @312b rim pa'i shes rab thabs kyi
T02D1336:312b-1: rnam par dag pa zhes bltas te /
T02D1336:312b-2: de ni lam dang nye ba'i lam mo //
T02D1336:312b-3: dur khrod brgyad kyi nang du sna tshogs chu skyes
T02D1336:312b-4: kyi lte ba la a'a li k'a li h'um gi
T02D1336:312b-5: yi ge rdo rje sems dpa'i rang bzhin rang gi
T02D1336:312b-6: 'od kyi rig ma dang gnyis su med pa'i sbyor
T02D1336:312b-9: bde ba chen po mngon par dga' ba'i rang bzhin
T02D1336:312b-10: ye shes sems dpa' dkyil 'khor la bzhugs zhes bya'o
T02D1336:312b-11: // dpal dga' ba'i me tog gi phreng ba las
T02D1336:312b-12: ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor dur khrod la sogs pa'i
T02D1336:312b-13: gnas kyi don bstan pa zhes bya ba ste drug
T02D1336:312b-15: / de nas gzhan yang dpal ye shes mkha' 'gro la mchod pa'i don du bsam gtan bstan te /
T02D1336:312b-16: dpa'i slob dpon ni kun rdzob dang don dam pa
T02D1336:312b-17: mi spang ba'i bya bas ye shes chen po 'byung
T02D1336:312b-18: ba'i phyir steng gi tshigs rgyas pa'i don du man
T02D1336:312b-19: ngag las sgo gzhan thams cad 'gog gi / lus
T02D1336:312b-20: la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal gyis mnan pa de ltar
T02D1336:312b-22: de'i rjes su rgyal sras mo bzhin du rang gis
T02D1336:312b-23: dbang bskur ba dang sra ba dang mtho ba'i nu
T02D1336:312b-24: ma dang / padma mdzes pa dang autpala'i 'dab ma ring ba'i spyan can /
T02D1336:312b-25: tsandan rlon pa'i dris khyab pa /
T02D1336:312b-26: bla ma'i man ngag las bsrub dang bsrubs pa chen
T02D1336:312b-27: pos rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma'i gnas nye
T02D1336:312b-28: bar bltas te / yang na btsums pa dang bye ba la sogs pa'i rab tu sbyor bas /
T02D1336:312b-29: lte ba'i dbus na bzhugs pa'i 'od chen po'i bdag
T02D1336:312b-30: nyid gtum mo rab rgyas par las kyi rlung gis
T02D1336:312b-31: grogs byas te rang gi gnas su rang gi 'od
T02D1336:312b-32: kyis dga' ba dang mngon par dga' ba dga' ba
T02D1336:312b-34: myos pa dang chung zad g-yo ba rnam par g-yo ba dang /
T02D1336:312b-35: khro ba chen pos shin tu 'bar bar rmad du byung ba /
T02D1336:312b-36: glog chen po'i g-yo ba'i rnam pa ltar sgra chen
T02D1336:312b-37: po sgrogs pa kho nas gsang ba'i lte ba'i gnas
T02D1336:312b-39: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa phung po dang
T02D1336:312b-40: khams dang skye mched la sogs pa shin tu bsregs
T02D1336:312b-41: nas / dang po dang dbus dang tha ma'i lam
T02D1336:312b-42: nas smin phrag gi 'khor lo'i lam ao rgyan gyi
T02D1336:312b-43: tshigs rgyas par gser sgo'i dz'a landha rar spyi gtsug
T02D1336:313a-0: gi mtshams su nang gi bu @313a * //
T02D1336:313a-1: ga'i bde ba chen po'i gnas bdud rtsi'i gnas su 'jug go //
T02D1336:313a-2: der rang dga' bas ngal so nas dga' ba'i 'od kyis bde ba chen po grub pa /
T02D1336:313a-3: byang chub kyi sems shin tu khengs par gsol nas mngon par dga' ba'i nang gi reg bya las /
T02D1336:313a-4: ro chen po 'ong ba'i dbang gis sngar bsregs pa
T02D1336:313a-5: yang rab tu tshim pa'i don du thugs rje chen
T02D1336:313a-6: po'i sprin rtag tu rgyun ma chad bar bdud rtsi'i
T02D1336:313a-7: rgyun gyi char 'bab par byed do //
T02D1336:313a-8: de nas yang rten gyi rtsa'i 'khor lo 'dzin khyer te /
T02D1336:313a-9: zhi ba'i gzugs kyis bde ba chen po'i dga' ba'i
T02D1336:313a-10: dgyes pa'i yid kyis rlag pa dang longs spyod dang
T02D1336:313a-11: dbang gi nga rgyal gyis rang gi gnas su rjes
T02D1336:313a-12: su gshegs so // rlag pa dang longs spyod dang
T02D1336:313a-13: ngal so ba dang 'gro ba dang khengs pa dang
T02D1336:313a-14: bum pa dang dus dang tshe dang gnas skabs dang
T02D1336:313a-15: su gshegs so // / g-yas pa dang g-yon pa dang /
T02D1336:313a-16: dbus la brten nas chu tshod sum cu rtsa drug
T02D1336:313a-17: gi bar du bde ba chen po'i bdag nyid kyi
T02D1336:313a-18: gtum mo bskal pas go rims su rtsa'i 'khor lor
T02D1336:313a-19: shar ba'o // dzny'a na bh'u ti'i zhal snga nas /
T02D1336:313a-20: rtsa zhes bya ba'i dngos po med pa na /
T02D1336:313a-21: bde ba chen po la sogs pa phyi nang gi reg bya nye bar mi rnyed de /
T02D1336:313a-22: mi rnyed pa'i phyir dga' ba la sogs pa dang /
T02D1336:313a-23: rgyu dang 'bras bu dang dbang gsum gyi bdag nyid kyi man ngag chad pa'i dngos por 'gyur ro //
T02D1336:313a-24: bde ba chen po mi shes pa'i phyir byang chub mi rnyid do zhes bshad do //
T02D1336:313a-25: de bas dpe'i slob dpon gyis rtsa'i 'khor lo sbom phra la sogs pa'i bsam gtan spangs nas /
T02D1336:313a-26: bla ma rje btsun gyis bka' stsal bar bya zhes bshad do //
T02D1336:313a-27: dang po yan lag g-yas g-yon du longs spyod ma dang /
T02D1336:313a-50: nag mo ma zhes pa dang /
T02D1336:313b-2: dge ba ma yin pa dang /
T02D1336:313b-3: rang gi ngo bo min pa dang /
T02D1336:313b-29: rkang pa g-yas g-yon phyed phyed kyi cha'i grangs nyi shu rtsa bzhi 'gro ba dang /
T02D1336:313b-30: khengs pa dang mchog dang chad pa'i shar ba'i rtsa rnams kyi mtshan nyid kyi don to //
T02D1336:313b-31: dbus kyi rked rus kyi dbyug pa'i snying po'i nang du /
T02D1336:313b-40: bdud rtsi yon tan ma dang /
T02D1336:313b-43: rnam par sgeg ma'i nga rgyal ma dang /
T02D1336:313b-55: btung ba la sogs pa kho na ste /
T02D1336:313b-67: gzhang kha'i kumba ka'i rang bzhin dga' ba 'byung ba'i
T02D1336:313b-68: rtsa gsum gyi dra ba'i sdom pa rten dang brten
T02D1336:313b-69: pa'i ye shes kyi bye brag tu bde ba chen
T02D1336:313b-70: po khong du chud par byed pa /
T02D1336:313b-71: 'od kyi bdag nyid can reg bya med pa /
T02D1336:313b-72: ye shes kyi me'i nam mkha'i rang bzhin gtum mo'am /
T02D1336:313b-73: rtog med pa zhi ba'i rang gi ngo bo bde
T02D1336:313b-74: ba chen po'i padma'i lte ba'i gyen du 'jig rten
T02D1336:313b-75: gyi khams du ma khyab pa /
T02D1336:313b-76: gnyis su med pa'i rnam pa /
T02D1336:313b-77: stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis kyi rtsa'i 'khor lo'i
T02D1336:313b-78: dbus thams cad kyi bdag nyid gcig pu'i ro'i rang
T02D1336:313b-79: bzhin / dpal rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma zhes man ngag las so //
T02D1336:313b-80: dpal dga' ba'i me tog gi phreng ba las gnas
T02D1336:313b-81: gsum na yod pa'i rtsa'i dra ba'i sdom pa dang
T02D1336:314a-1: mo chen mo'i sbyor brten dang brten pa'i ye shes kyi don bstan pa zhes bya ste bdun pa'o /
T02D1336:314a-3: // / de nas gzhan yang ye shes mkha' 'gro la
T02D1336:314a-4: mchod pa'i don rnam pa dang bcas pa'i dkyil 'khor
T02D1336:314a-5: gyi 'khor lo dam tshig sems dpa'i bdag nyid can
T02D1336:314a-10: sna tshogs padma 'dab ma brgyad kyi lte ba la
T02D1336:314a-11: stong pa dang snying rje dbyer med pa'i rang bzhin
T02D1336:314a-12: can / bdag nyid bsnyen pa la sogs pa'i yan
T02D1336:314a-13: lag bzhi'i 'bras bu'i gtso bo sngar bskur ba'i mig
T02D1336:314a-14: la sogs pa byin gyis brlabs pa dang /
T02D1336:314a-15: dbang blang ba la sogs pas sku rdzogs pa 'jigs byed chen po dang /
T02D1336:314a-16: zla ba dang nyi ma'i steng du dam tshig gi
T02D1336:314a-17: mkha' 'gro ma bcu drug gi dkyil 'khor gyi dbus
T02D1336:314a-18: su phyag bcu drug pa zhal brgyad pa /
T02D1336:314a-19: zhabs bzhi pa g-yas brkyang pa /
T02D1336:314a-20: g-yon bskum pa'i sku spang rgyan gyi me tog gi mdog can spyan gsum pa /
T02D1336:314a-21: zhal gsum ni dkar ba dang dmar ba dang ljang ba dang /
T02D1336:314a-22: zhal gzhan bung ba dang 'dra ba /
T02D1336:314a-23: steng gi 'jigs pa chen po bong bu'i rnam pa'i
T02D1336:314a-24: mche ba bgrad pa 'jigs pa bstan pa'i phyag rgya
T02D1336:314a-25: la sogs pa yongs su gyur pa las skad cig
T02D1336:314a-26: gis de lta bu'i gzugs thugs rje chen po dang
T02D1336:314a-27: / khro bo'i sku bskal pa chen po'i me bas lhag pa'i 'od dang ldan pa /
T02D1336:314a-28: rgyal ba thams cad kyi bdag po /
T02D1336:314a-29: dur khrod chen po'i dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su mchog gi nam mkha'i dkyil na /
T02D1336:314a-30: dam tshig mkha' 'gro'i dbang phyug mas 'khyud pa /
T02D1336:314a-31: dpal dam tshig sems dpa'i dbang phyug skye ba dang /
T02D1336:314a-33: gnas pa'i rnam pa'i byed pa po'i dregs pa 'joms pa'i phyir bzhengs pa /
T02D1336:314a-34: rgyu mas brgyus pa'i mgo bo chen po'i chun 'phyang gis brgyan pa'i yan lag can /
T02D1336:314a-36: rus pa'i rgyan can skra ser po gyen du 'greng ba /
T02D1336:314a-37: smin ma rgyas pa spyan dmar ba /
T02D1336:314a-38: gar dgu'i ro chen po'i ngang tshul can /
T02D1336:314a-40: tshangs pa'i pags pa rked par khyab pa /
T02D1336:314a-41: ska rags kyis bcings pa'i sil sil gyi sgra sgrogs pa /
T02D1336:314a-42: ma mchu'i ro'i bdud rtsi'i btung bas bzi ba /
T02D1336:314a-43: zhi ba chen po'i pags pa bshus ma thag pa'i
T02D1336:314b-0: @314b rlon pa phyag gnyis kyis gyen du dpyangs pa
T02D1336:314b-1: / padma kha phye bas dbu'i rin po che'i rnam par brgyan pa /
T02D1336:314b-2: phyag lhag ma rnams ni 'jigs byed chen po khrag chen po kha nas 'dzag pa /
T02D1336:314b-3: snod na yod pa'i bza' ba dang btung ba'i don gyi phyir bsnams zhes bya'o //
T02D1336:314b-4: dam tshig mkha' 'gro'i dbang phyug ma bcom ldan 'das dang mnyam pa /
T02D1336:314b-6: spyan gsum pa skra grol ba /
T02D1336:314b-8: gnyis su med pa'i sbyor ba'i bde ba chen pos mnyam par 'khyud pa /
T02D1336:314b-9: rus pa'i rgyan gyis rnam par rgyan pa /
T02D1336:314b-10: mi bskyod pa'i cod pan bcings pa /
T02D1336:314b-12: shin tu rid pa ske la 'khyud pa /
T02D1336:314b-13: ma mchu'i ro'i bdud rtsi'i btung bas bzi ba /
T02D1336:314b-14: thams cad kham du byed pa'i dam tshig gi yan lag ma'o //
T02D1336:314b-15: sna tshogs padma'i 'dab ma brgyad kyi shar gyi 'dab
T02D1336:314b-16: mar legs dgyes sku regs ma sku mdog nag mo
T02D1336:314b-17: / byang gi 'dab mar legs dgyes 'gro ma ser mo /
T02D1336:314b-18: nub tu legs dgyes 'od dmar mo /
T02D1336:314b-19: lhor legs dgyes gtum mo ljang mdog ma /
T02D1336:314b-20: me'i mtshams su legs dgyes phreng ba ma ri bong can 'od /
T02D1336:314b-21: srin po'i mtshams su legs dgyes bum pa ma nag
T02D1336:314b-22: ser gyi mdog / rlung gi mtshams su legs dgyes
T02D1336:314b-23: dri ma autpala'i mdog / dbang ldan gyi mtshams su
T02D1336:314b-24: legs dgyes mdzes pa nyi ma gzhon nu'i mdog /
T02D1336:314b-25: thams cad spyan gsum pa g-yon brkyang bas gnas pa
T02D1336:314b-26: / skra grol ba gcer bu ro la zhon pa /
T02D1336:314b-28: ral gri dang snod bandha dang /
T02D1336:314b-31: rus pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa'o //
T02D1336:314b-32: shar dang byang dang nub dang lho'i mtshams su legs dgyes sgra ma /
T02D1336:314b-35: legs dgyes sprin ni rdza rnga dang /
T02D1336:314b-38: rnga sgra sgrogs phar byed pa gzugs gnyis pa phyag gnyis pa'o //
T02D1336:314b-39: shar dang byang dang nub dang lho'i sgor legs dgyes 'od ma /
T02D1336:314b-43: phyag gnyis kyis mda' gzhu 'gengs pa /
T02D1336:315a-0: gzhan bzhugs thabs dang rgyan la @315a * //
T02D1336:315a-1: sogs pa ni sna tshogs padma la bzhugs pa'i rnal 'byor ma de bzhin du bya'o //
T02D1336:315a-2: gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg dang /
T02D1336:315a-3: ye shes dang chos kyi dbyings dang /
T02D1336:315a-4: sa dang chu dang me dang rlung dang nam mkha' dang /
T02D1336:315a-5: chags pa dang phrag dog dang nga rgyal dang gti mug rnam par dag pas /
T02D1336:315a-6: lha mo brgyad gnyis dam tshig gi mkha' 'gro ma'i
T02D1336:315a-7: rnam par dag pa bskyed pa'i rim pa lung las
T02D1336:315a-8: gsungs so // dpal dga' ba'i me tog gi phreng ba las dam tshig sems dpa'i bdag nyid can /
T02D1336:315a-9: dpal ye shes kyi mkha' 'gro'i bskyed pa'i rim pa'i
T02D1336:315a-10: bsgom pa bstan pa zhes bya ba ste brgyad pa'o
T02D1336:315a-12: / // / de nas gzhan yang dpal ye shes mkha' 'gro la mchod pa'i don du /
T02D1336:315a-13: mchod sbyin gyi cho ga bshad de /
T02D1336:315a-14: dang por gnas dang nye ba'i gnas la sogs par
T02D1336:315a-15: mchod pa byas pa'i 'og tu nang gi mchod sbyin
T02D1336:315a-16: gsum bya'o // dngos po dang rten dang rnam par
T02D1336:315a-17: 'byed pa ni bde ba chen po la sogs pa'i
T02D1336:315a-18: gsum bya'o // 'khor lo bzhis / tha ma dang 'bring dang rab dang /
T02D1336:315a-19: rab kyi rab dbang po dang /
T02D1336:315a-22: sgrub pa dang sgrub pa chen po dang /
T02D1336:315a-26: rang bzhin gyi dga' ba dang /
T02D1336:315a-27: gnas la sogs par chu tshod sum cu rtsa drug gi bar du kun spyod 'khor lo'i rim pas /
T02D1336:315a-28: ma mo'i drangs pa'i sngags kyis mchod pa'i mchod sbyin bya'o //
T02D1336:315a-31: rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma khong du chud
T02D1336:315a-32: pa'i ye shes kyi 'od kyis bde ba chen po'i
T02D1336:315a-33: 'khor lo zhu ba'i bdud rtsi bde ba chen po'i
T02D1336:315a-34: bdag nyid can / byang chub kyi sems kyi thigs
T02D1336:315a-35: pa re re gnas dang nye ba'i gnas na bzhugs
T02D1336:315a-36: pa'i mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyi mchod pa'i rim pa'o
T02D1336:315a-37: bdag nyid can / // dang po'i gnas kyi chu skyes dpal ao rgyan du gzugs ldan ma /
T02D1336:315a-38: dag pa'i dngos po rnam par snang mdzad kyis dz'a landha rar bung ldan ma sgeg pa'i dngos po /
T02D1336:315a-39: nam mkhas pull'i ra m'a la yar bya rog sna ma /
T02D1336:315a-40: dga' ba'i dngos po nyi shu pas k'a ma r'u par du ma /
T02D1336:315a-41: rab tshim gyi dngos po bcu gsum pas /
T02D1336:315a-42: m'a la war glang chen kha ma /
T02D1336:315b-0: dad pa'i dngos po tva ra ya'i mthar @315b gyis sindhur dang po'i stobs ma /
T02D1336:315b-1: khong du chud pa'i dngos po gsum pa'i gnyis pas n'a gar du ltogs nas /
T02D1336:315b-2: gsal pa'i dngos po bcu gnyis pas sing nga lar lce rings ma /
T02D1336:315b-3: lta ba'i dngos po'i 'od kyis mu mu nir lo ma ring /
T02D1336:315b-4: sbyor ba'i rten brgyad pa'i bdun pas de b'i ko t'ir lto ba che /
T02D1336:315b-5: dam tshig gi rten lnga pas ko lu tar dri ldan ma /
T02D1336:315b-6: ro'i rten brgyad pa'i gnyis par aarbu dar dri rngo ma /
T02D1336:315b-7: tshul gyi rten nyi shu bdun pa ha ri ke la bar bsil sbyin ma /
T02D1336:315b-8: g-yo ba rten nyi shu lnga pas /
T02D1336:315b-10: dus kyi rten nyi shu pas lamba kar dbyangs snyan ma /
T02D1336:315b-11: rnam par smin pa'i rten sum cu gnyis pas k'a nytsi kar pu linda ra /
T02D1336:315b-12: bsnyen pa'i rten brgyad pa'i brgyad pas las kyi grong du autpala'i dri /
T02D1336:315b-13: las kyi rnam par 'byed pa'i gsum pa'i gsum pas /
T02D1336:315b-14: gser gyi gling du padma'i dri /
T02D1336:315b-15: reg bya'i rnam par 'byed pa lnga'i dang pos /
T02D1336:315b-16: kongka nar mtsho me tshig byed /
T02D1336:315b-17: dga' ba'i rnam par 'byed pa'i chu yis byin dar rkang rings ma /
T02D1336:315b-18: bsam gtan gyi rnam par 'byed pa bzhi pa'i dang pos yi dgas 'dus par rus ldan ma /
T02D1336:315b-19: nges par 'byed pa'i sems lnga pa'i bzhi pas /
T02D1336:315b-20: rgya mtsho'i ngogs su chu srin mig ma /
T02D1336:315b-21: lta ba'i rnam par 'byed pa brgyad pa'i bzhi pas /
T02D1336:315b-23: chags pa'i rnam par 'byed pa bzhi pa'i gsum pas /
T02D1336:315b-24: gzhon nu'i grong khyer du sna tshogs yan lag ma /
T02D1336:315b-25: brtson 'grus rnam par 'byed pa sum cu'i gsum pas /
T02D1336:315b-26: kasmi rar ga pur lus ma /
T02D1336:315b-27: 'phro ba'i ye shes bzhi pa'i lnga pas /
T02D1336:315b-28: ke ra tvar rma bya'i sgro ma /
T02D1336:315b-29: dran pa'i ye shes bzhi pa'i gsum pas /
T02D1336:315b-31: brtson 'grus kyi ye shes nyi shu pas /
T02D1336:315b-32: kar nu dzar dag pa'i lus ma /
T02D1336:315b-33: kun spyod ye shes dang po gsum pas /
T02D1336:315b-34: 'chi med grong khyer du skra legs ma /
T02D1336:315b-35: bskyed pa'i ye shes gsum pa'i gnyis pas /
T02D1336:315b-36: mi'i yul du sna tshogs padma /
T02D1336:315b-37: gleng gzhi ye shes bcu gnyis pas /
T02D1336:315b-38: sa 'og tu 'dod pa'i ske rags ma /
T02D1336:315b-39: rnyed pa'i ye shes bdun pas ri rab rtser padma'i zhal ma /
T02D1336:315b-40: gnyid sad ye shes gsum pa'i gsum pas so //
T02D1336:315b-41: dang po'i lte bar shar gyi lus 'phags su srog ma /
T02D1336:316a-1: lnga pa'i lnga pas sgra mi snyan du la la n'a /
T02D1336:316a-2: mchog dga' brgyad pa'i bzhi pas ba lang spyod du ra sa n'a /
T02D1336:316a-3: chad pa'i dga' ba sv'a'i yig 'brus 'dzam bu'i gling du aa ba dh'u t'i /
T02D1336:316a-4: rang bzhin dga' ba'i ha'i yig 'brus so //
T02D1336:316a-5: dpal dga' ba'i me tog gi phreng ba las ma
T02D1336:316a-6: mo'i btus pa'i sngags kyis mchod pa'i cho ga dang
T02D1336:316a-7: / gnas dang nye ba'i gnas la sogs pa dang dngos po dang rten dang ye shes dang /
T02D1336:316a-8: rnam par 'byed pa'i rim pa bzhi'i don bskyed pa'i
T02D1336:316a-9: rim pa'i yan lag bstan pa zhes bya ba ste
T02D1336:316a-11: / de nas gzhan yang dpal ye shes mkha' 'gro la mchod pa'i don du /
T02D1336:316a-12: nang du mchod sbyin gsum gyi cho ga bshad de /
T02D1336:316a-13: chos kyi 'byung gnas kyi rnam pa'i gnas su padma'i khab tu ri bong can shar ba /
T02D1336:316a-14: nam phyed kyi dus su pingga la'i rtsa 'gro ba'i
T02D1336:316a-15: snang ba zhu bar gyur pa'i h'um gi sngags kyis
T02D1336:316a-16: mchod par bya'o // bde ba'i gnas 'dab ma brgyad
T02D1336:316a-17: kyi lte ba'i dbus su nyi ma shar ba'i nyi
T02D1336:316a-18: ma phyed dus su aarda'i snang ba mched pa nur
T02D1336:316a-20: phat ka ra'i sngags kyi mchog gi dga' bas mchod par bya'o //
T02D1336:316a-21: bde ba chen po'i gnas su drug cu rtsa bzhi'i
T02D1336:316a-22: 'dab ma'i padma'i wam gyi rnam pa'i lte ba ba
T02D1336:316a-23: ra ta ka'i nang du chu shing padma'i phra mo'i
T02D1336:316a-24: bu ga 'byung ba'i dus su so sho mna'i gnas
T02D1336:316a-26: gor gor por gyur pa'i bde ba chen po mi
T02D1336:316a-27: g-yo ba sa ka ra'i sngags kyis mchod par bya
T02D1336:316a-29: mchod sbyin gsum gyi cho ga'i dus su skal ldan
T02D1336:316a-30: ma yin ma 'jug pa mi sbyin zhes brda'i tshig
T02D1336:316a-31: go // aindra bh'u ti'i zhal snga nas dbang gsum
T02D1336:316a-32: thob pa nang gi reg bya nyams su myong ba
T02D1336:316a-33: go // shes pa / ye shes kyi snang ba gsum mthong ba de kho na nyid /
T02D1336:316a-34: chags pa dang chags pa dang bral ba'i 'dzin pa spangs pa /
T02D1336:316a-35: skal ldan la 'jug pa sbyin par bya zhes bshad do //
T02D1336:316a-36: bzhi pa'i skabs su mchod sbyin gsum gshegs su gsol ba'o //
T02D1336:316a-38: gnyis su med pa rang rig pa /
T02D1336:316a-39: nam mkha' bzhin du bde ba chen po /
T02D1336:316a-40: rlabs dang bral ba'i rnam pa /
T02D1336:316a-41: ha'i yig 'bru'i sngags brjod pas rab 'od kyi ngal bso ba'i bsnyen pa bya ba man ngag go //
T02D1336:316b-0: dpal dga' ba'i me tog gi @316b phreng ba las /
T02D1336:316b-1: nang gi mchod sbyin gsum gyi cho ga dang snang
T02D1336:316b-2: ba bzhi rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i don bstan pa zhes
T02D1336:316b-5: // / de nas gzhan yang dpal ye shes mkha' 'gro
T02D1336:316b-6: la mchod pa'i don du sbyin sreg gi las bshad
T02D1336:316b-7: de / sgrub pa'i dbang po kun sbyin sreg gi
T02D1336:316b-8: las ma yin par rab dang 'bring dang tha ma'i
T02D1336:316b-9: de / dngos grub bam / thog ma dang tha
T02D1336:316b-10: ma dang dbus kyi gnas su myong ba'i sar rtog
T02D1336:316b-11: pa med pa'i 'bras bu mi rnyed de /
T02D1336:316b-12: de ma rnyed pas bzhi pa'i rim pa'i sbyor ba'i
T02D1336:316b-13: dngos grub chen po thob par 'gyur ba med do
T02D1336:316b-14: // thob par mi 'gyur bas 'jigs pa'i phyir /
T02D1336:316b-15: btang snyoms ma yin pa'i bya bas rten 'brel dang
T02D1336:316b-16: kun brtags la sogs par gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i
T02D1336:316b-17: bskyed pa'i rim rten dang brten pa nges par bya'o
T02D1336:316b-18: // de yang rang la byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa'i dam tshig gi spyod pa /
T02D1336:316b-19: rab kyi rab bsnyen pa la sogs pas dbyer med par mthong bar bya'o //
T02D1336:316b-20: dpal dgyes pa'i rdo rje las /
T02D1336:316b-21: dbyer med rtag pa'i dngos grub ni //
T02D1336:316b-22: phyag rgya'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur //
T02D1336:316b-24: bde bas na phyag rgya dang /
T02D1336:316b-28: ye shes dang dga' ba la sogs pa dang /
T02D1336:316b-29: spro ba dang bsdu ba thams cad nang gi sbyor bas mthong bar bya'o //
T02D1336:316b-36: ro bsrubs pa dang bsrub thabs chen pos las kyi
T02D1336:316b-37: rlung gis mnyam pa'i 'khyud pa'i dga' ba khong du
T02D1336:316b-38: chud pa las / lte ba chen po'i chu skyes snying po'i nang du yungs kar sbom po tsam /
T02D1336:316b-39: nyi ma'i gnas pa ye shes chen po'i thig le /
T02D1336:316b-40: yi ge med pa mi bzad pa sa dang chu
T02D1336:316b-41: dang me dang rlung dang bral ba glo bur ba
T02D1336:316b-42: zab pa / nam mkha'i dbus na gnas pa /
T02D1336:316b-43: phra mo'i yang phra mo mi shigs pa phra ba
T02D1336:316b-44: ye shes chen po'i 'od kyi rang bzhin gyi tshul
T02D1336:316b-45: tsam / sbyong thabs la sogs pa la brten te langs nas 'khyud pa dang /
T02D1336:316b-46: 'o la sogs pa'i sgyu rtsal byas pas mchog gi
T02D1336:316b-47: bde ba'i ye shes myong ba la dpyod pa 'di
T02D1336:316b-48: ni bde ba chen po'i zhes myong ba ste /
T02D1336:317a-2: gnyis gnyis 'khyud pa'i rgyud kyi rim pa las mchi ma dang /
T02D1336:317a-3: rdul dang yan lag mi brtan pa dang /
T02D1336:317a-5: de lta bu'i rtags ni ye shes kyi snang ba mthong zhing /
T02D1336:317a-6: dbus kyi keng rus kyi dbyug pa'i thog ma bde
T02D1336:317a-7: ba chen po'i 'khor lo'i padma'i lte ba'i nang gi
T02D1336:317a-9: dmar thigs kyi gnas su ngal so ste /
T02D1336:317a-10: ye shes chen po'i bdud rtsi'i bum pa bzung nas
T02D1336:317a-11: kun du 'jig rten skyong ba la sogs pa la
T02D1336:317a-12: sna tshogs kyi mchod pa byas te /
T02D1336:317a-13: de nas rang la byin gyi rlabs kyi rim pas
T02D1336:317a-14: 'khor lo bzhi'i chu skyes kyi lte ba'i nang du
T02D1336:317a-15: bzhugs pa'i me de la dgug pa dang /
T02D1336:317a-16: dbang bskur ba la sogs pa rdzogs par byas nas /
T02D1336:317a-17: dang po bde ba chen po'i thab khung gi nang
T02D1336:317a-18: du dgang blugs bzhi dga' ba'i me tog gi ri
T02D1336:317a-19: bong can gyi thig le bkram pa /
T02D1336:317a-20: aom zhes slob dpon aindra bh'u ti'i zhal snga nas kyis bshad do //
T02D1336:317a-21: de nas dgang blugs brgyad longs spyod du mngon par
T02D1336:317a-22: dga' ba'i me tog gser gyi thig le bkram pa'i
T02D1336:317a-23: aa'i rnam pas zhes bya ba /
T02D1336:317a-24: dri med rdo rje'i zhal snga nas kyis bshad do //
T02D1336:317a-25: de'i 'og tu dgang blugs bcu gnyis chad pa'i dga'
T02D1336:317a-26: ba'i me tog dmar bkram thig le chos 'khor lor
T02D1336:317a-27: / h'um yi ge'i sngags kyis zhes slob dpon padma badzra'i zhal snga nas bshad do //
T02D1336:317a-28: de'i 'og tu phyi'i rnam par rtog pa'i bdag nyid can /
T02D1336:317a-29: phung po dang khams dang skye mched la sogs pa'i yam shing blugs nas gang blugs lta bar byed /
T02D1336:317a-30: longs spyod dang bde ba chen po'i dngos gnyis phrad
T02D1336:317a-31: pa'i dbus su 'khor lo'i lte ba gnyis kyi nang
T02D1336:317a-33: aa na tsa ka / smin phrag gi 'khor lo'i steng gi mtshams kyi bu ga'i nang du /
T02D1336:317a-34: ao dyan gyi lam nas bdud rtsi'i chu bo'i rlabs
T02D1336:317a-35: kyis 'gro bas snying gar rol nas aanytsa ka'i blugs
T02D1336:317a-36: gzar gyi rtse mo'i 'og rnam pa'i snod du ngal
T02D1336:317a-37: so nas / rgyun ma chad pa'i bdud rtsi'i mar
T02D1336:317a-38: gyi rgyun phat kyi sngags kyis nang gi lte ba'i
T02D1336:317a-39: ye shes kyi thabs kyi chu skyes kyi lte ba
T02D1336:317a-40: phra mo'i ba ra ta ka'i nam mkhar bde ba
T02D1336:317a-42: dga' ba bcu drug gi thig le rab tu bkram pa /
T02D1336:317a-43: mngon par dga' ba'i gnas su dgang blugs /
T02D1336:317b-0: @317b bar du tshim pa'i don du mi 'khrul ba'i
T02D1336:317b-1: sems kyis sbyin par bya zhes slob dpon zhabs kyi
T02D1336:317b-2: padma'i bka' drin gyis me'i las kyis man ngag gi
T02D1336:317b-3: brda zhes bya'o // dpal dga' ba'i me tog gi
T02D1336:317b-4: phreng ba las grub pa bzhi'i rang la byin gyis
T02D1336:317b-5: brlab pa'i rim pa'i mdor bstan pa dang /
T02D1336:317b-6: gnyis su med pa'i thig le'i tshul dang shes rab
T02D1336:317b-7: dang thabs gnyis su med par sbyor ba'i sbyin sreg
T02D1336:317b-8: gi las kyis don bstan pa zhes bya ba ste
T02D1336:317b-10: / de nas gzhan yang dpal ye shes mkha' 'gro
T02D1336:317b-11: la mchod pa'i don du dus 'byung ba'i grangs kyi
T02D1336:317b-12: mdud pa sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa /
T02D1336:317b-13: dbang bskur ba thob pa'i sems can gyi tshogs la dga' ba'i sngags mdud bshad de /
T02D1336:317b-14: sprul pa la sogs pa'i thabs bzhi'i rten gyi rtsa'i
T02D1336:317b-15: skud pa'i dbyu gu nyi shu rtsa brgyad lhag pa'i
T02D1336:317b-16: brgya'i phyed nyin mtshan phyi'i rten dang brten pa'i kun
T02D1336:317b-17: sbyor ro // sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi chu tshod kyi bar du nang gi rtsa'i kun spyod /
T02D1336:317b-18: rlung la zhon nas byang chub kyi sems dga' ba
T02D1336:317b-19: bcu drug sbyor bas sam skri ta bcu drug la
T02D1336:317b-20: kun 'bab po // bde ba chen po'i dmar thigs
T02D1336:317b-21: dga' ba'i thig le thun tshod brgyad kyi phyed 'bar
T02D1336:317b-22: ba phyed 'dzag go zhes bcu drug gi phyed kyi
T02D1336:317b-24: de lta bu'i 'byung ba bzhi'i dkyil 'khor 'byung ba'i
T02D1336:317b-25: dbus nas srog gi grangs brgya brgyad lhag pa'i stong
T02D1336:317b-26: phrag bcu phung po'i rten sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi
T02D1336:317b-27: mdud pa dang ldan pa'i keng rus chen po'i dbyug
T02D1336:317b-28: pa'i nang du chu shing gi snying po'i rnam pa'i
T02D1336:317b-29: dbus nas srog gi 'byung ba spro ba dang bsdu
T02D1336:317b-30: ba g-yas dang g-yon pa'i dbang po'i rten du nges
T02D1336:317b-31: par sbyar te / dri ma med pa'i blo gros
T02D1336:317b-32: kyi bsam gtan gyi bdag nyid kho na dus kyi
T02D1336:317b-33: 'byung ba'i grangs bgrang ba zhes skud pa'i mdud pa
T02D1336:317b-34: par sbyar te / bcings pa'o // mchog gi dga'
T02D1336:317b-35: ba'i gnas kyi chu skyes nam mkha' bde chen rgyal
T02D1336:317b-36: po'i pho brang nas rnam par shes pa'i dga' bas
T02D1336:317b-37: rlung me chus bskyed pa'i rim pas 'byung zhing de'i
T02D1336:317b-38: nang du rlung rang bzhin gyis 'khor zhing 'khrul pas
T02D1336:317b-39: pha rol mi rnyed ces bral pa'i gnas pa'i bye
T02D1336:317b-40: par sbyar te / bcings pa'o // brag go // sems dang sems las byung ba dang /
T02D1336:317b-41: ma rig pa'i rlung la brten nas rang bzhin gyis /
T02D1336:318a-0: srid pa dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i gleng gzhir gyur @318a * //
T02D1336:318a-2: mchod pa gnyis zla ba dang /
T02D1336:318a-5: me de dag gis sems can du gyur pa de
T02D1336:318a-6: yang rnam par dpyod pas gang du yang sems can
T02D1336:318a-7: med de snang ba mched pa gcig pu'i stong pa
T02D1336:318a-8: nyid chen po'i byin gyi rlabs kyis so //
T02D1336:318a-9: de ni gcig pus zla ba dang /
T02D1336:318a-12: snang ba gsum shar ba dang nub pa dang /
T02D1336:318a-13: tho rangs dga'i ba'i bdag nyid can kun rdzob kyi
T02D1336:318a-14: rlung la brten nas tha ma dang 'bring dang rab
T02D1336:318a-15: dang de dag la sogs pa 'dus pas ma rig
T02D1336:318a-16: pa zhes bya ba'i stobs chen po yun ring po'i
T02D1336:318a-17: dus nas rang bzhin kun gyi mtshan mo dang nyin
T02D1336:318a-18: mo dang mtshams kyi bar du dus kyi 'byung ba
T02D1336:318a-19: byed pa zhes bsams nas rten dang brten pa dpyod
T02D1336:318a-20: par byed do // rnam par shes pa'i rlung ma
T02D1336:318a-21: rig pa'i rten la gnas nas rlung dang ldan pa'i
T02D1336:318a-22: phung po dang khams dang skye mched rnams srog gi
T02D1336:318a-23: rten med pa de ni ro'o //
T02D1336:318a-24: rten dang brten pa'i rnam par 'byed pa las gang
T02D1336:318a-25: gi tshe las kyi lus mi len pa de'i tshe
T02D1336:318a-26: bar ma do dang stong pa'i rang bzhin no //
